titleStmt.title: The rules and directions of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: concerning the examination of all such as shall be admitted to the sacrament of the Lords Supper, within the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales: contained in an ordinance of the twentieth of October, 1645. with questions and answers concerning the same.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
